review: Dr. Bhavin is very professional and execllent at his job. He is very warm and patient by nature and answers all your doubts and questions. Personally I m somebody who has lot of queries on even simpler things in life. I had to get a tooth extraction done which was though done by another surgeon at the same clinic but I troubled Dr. Bhavin with so many questions on my visit to the clinic and over the phone. The entire staff at the clinic is very plolite and friendly. They proactively call you for the follow up. A big thumps up

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been Visiting Dr. Bhavin for the last few years for all my Dental issues. I had to re do all my teeth the patience and perfection with which he did was exceptional. He also explained to me at each point of time why and what he is doing.
Covid times the clinic is maintained well with all necessary precautions  from Doctors end as well as patients end requirements. One can move in without any fear of infection. One is tested for oxygen and temp too prior to going for treatment.
Good and kind staff too in the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I did my treatment for teeth straightening at American Dental Practice. I was very hesitant as I was going for the treatment pretty late as compared to the norm. Dr Bhavin answered all my queries patiently and due to his guidance I was convinced and started my treatment. I have been visiting the clinic for 3 yrs. He was always very patient and friendly. I am glad that I went ahead with the treatment and I am very happy with the end result. I strongly recommend Dr Bhavin and American dental practices.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor *** **** ********* *** explained the cause , actions taken and future steps in detail. I recommend him for other patients

Let me share what happened with me at American Dental:

Terrible Communication *** ******************* What can you do if the Doctor and the billing desk are hand in hand in confusing the patients with treatment charges? Billing desk (Ms. Payal) at American dental won't even get back to you if you question it. I had a root canal where crown fitting session was horrible. If you value your money and your time - Don't book a slot with Dr. Bhavin Shah. When Ms. Payal at front desk or doctor explains about charges, keep a notebook nearby and record the conversation. It took no time to go back on what was told and what was charged for the complete treatment.

- Hiteshwari
reply_text:
Dear Hiteshwari ,

Thank you for the feedback and our sincere apologies for the way you feel.

We have acknowledged in our personal discussion that the charges were appropriate and fair as per our normal service price list however I do appreciate that there has been some misunderstanding over the phased treatment charges .

We will endeavour to do our best for our patients and have noted your feedback to change our payment terms which we have now implemented .

Many thanks again for your kind words on the quality of treatment received and I am grateful for your personal message .

We will be here to help if you need any further assistance in future.


Regards 

Dr Bhavin Shah

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After many years of periodontal treatment with Dr. Bhavin at American Dental Practices, I opted for an all-on-four dental implant. The entire process was fully explained in terms that were easily understood. The medical aspects and procedures were detailed, the financing very doable, and the follow-up care by the doctor was extraordinary! A relatively quick and pain-free visit. I would definitely recommend this dental practice to anyone in need of periodontal work, and anyone considering dental implants.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had hardware for dental implants placed in my upper jaw this morning. After a consultation with Dr. Bhavin a few weeks ago I was confident that I had come to the right place and found the right dentist. I have been through dental in the past three years and I never imagined that I could feel so comfortable and reassured. Making the decision to receive my care here was easy for me. The procedure was smooth, fast and painless!! All three were a bonus for me. Dr. Bhavin is at the top of his game - he is thoughtful and caring. I felt at ease as soon as I sat in the chair. I would recommend this practice to anyone I know who needs this kind of dental care. The cost is reasonable and affordable. What a great experience! The office is large, bright and clean. There is such a good vibe here. Everyone is professional and courteous.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: It was a great experience meeting Dr. Bhavin Shah. He guided me well n informed me abt d whole procedure as how d treatment will go n all. He showed me his cases which he had treated n after showing BEFORE n AFTER videos I was amazed dat person at any age can bring out change in his/her personality by correcting smile. I will strongly recommend Dr. Bhavin Shah to evryone who is looking forward for any kind of dental treatment or correction of smile. Would like to thanks Dr. Bhavin shah n his team for wonderful hospitality.

***** ****** * *********** I was referred to this clinic by a friend of mine and I am glad I made the right decision. He gave me the confidence to go ahead and the end result is outstanding.
